filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0].transfer(_balances[0]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#646)
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1].transfer(_balances[1]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#647)

ECTools.toEthereumSignedMessage(string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#146-153) calls abi.encodePacked() with multiple dynamic arguments:
	- keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(prefix,uintToString(len),_msg)) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#152)

Reentrancy in LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#947-1026):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[0],tokenbalanceA),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#999-1005)
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[1],tokenbalanceI),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1006-1012)
	External calls sending eth:
	- channel.partyAddresses[0].transfer(ethbalanceA) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#994)
	- channel.partyAddresses[1].transfer(ethbalanceI) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#995)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- channel.isOpen = false (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1015)
	LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#407) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#407)
	- LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#470-503)
	- LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#947-1026)
	- LedgerChannel.closeVirtualChannel(bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#896-945)
	- LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677)
	- LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#409-468)
	- LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#539-597)
	- LedgerChannel.getChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1052-1087)
	- LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#754-818)
	- LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#505-536)
	- LedgerChannel.settleVC(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address,address,uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#820-894)
	- LedgerChannel.updateLCstate(bytes32,uint256[6],bytes32,string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#681-751)

Reentrancy in LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#470-503):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transfer(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0],Channels[_lcID].erc20Balances[0]),CreateChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#483-489)
	External calls sending eth:
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0].transfer(Channels[_lcID].ethBalances[0]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#478-480)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- delete Channels[_lcID] (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#502)
	LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#407) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- LedgerChannel.Channels (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#407)
	- LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#470-503)
	- LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#947-1026)
	- LedgerChannel.closeVirtualChannel(bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#896-945)
	- LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677)
	- LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#409-468)
	- LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#539-597)
	- LedgerChannel.getChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1052-1087)
	- LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#754-818)
	- LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#505-536)
	- LedgerChannel.settleVC(bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address,address,uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#820-894)
	- LedgerChannel.updateLCstate(bytes32,uint256[6],bytes32,string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#681-751)
LedgerChannel._isContained(bytes32,bytes,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1028-1049) is declared view but contains assembly code
ECTools.recoverSigner(bytes32,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#62-91) is declared view but contains assembly code
ECTools.uintToBytes32(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#138-143) is declared view but contains assembly code

LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#754-818) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(_isContained(_initState,_proof,Channels[_lcID].VCrootHash) == true) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#791-793)

LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#470-503) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] && Channels[_lcID].isOpen == false) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#471-474)

LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#539-597) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#545-548)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel)

findings.description:
LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#608)

LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(totalEthDeposit == _balances[0] + _balances[1]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#615)

LedgerChannel.joinChannel(bytes32,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#505-536) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == false) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#507)

LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(totalTokenDeposit == _balances[2] + _balances[3]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#616)

LedgerChannel._isContained(bytes32,bytes,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1028-1049) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cursor == _root (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1048)

LedgerChannel.LCOpenTimeout(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#470-503) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] && Channels[_lcID].isOpen == false) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#471-474)
	- require(bool)(now > Channels[_lcID].LCopenTimeout) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#475)
	- Channels[_lcID].initialDeposit[0] != 0 (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#477)
	- Channels[_lcID].initialDeposit[1] != 0 (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#482)

LedgerChannel.updateLCstate(bytes32,uint256[6],bytes32,string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#681-751) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(channel.isOpen) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#689)
	- require(bool)(channel.sequence < updateParams[0]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#690)
	- require(bool)(channel.ethBalances[0] + channel.ethBalances[1] >= updateParams[2] + updateParams[3]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#691-694)
	- require(bool)(channel.erc20Balances[0] + channel.erc20Balances[1] >= updateParams[4] + updateParams[5]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#695-698)
	- require(bool)(channel.updateLCtimeout > now) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#701)
	- require(bool)(channel.partyAddresses[0] == ECTools.recoverSigner(_state,_sigA)) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#720-722)
	- require(bool)(channel.partyAddresses[1] == ECTools.recoverSigner(_state,_sigI)) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#723-725)

LedgerChannel.closeVirtualChannel(bytes32,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#896-945) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen,LC is closed.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#897)
	- require(bool,string)(virtualChannels[_vcID].updateVCtimeout < now,Update vc timeout has not elapsed.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#902-905)
	- virtualChannels[_vcID].partyA == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#914)
	- virtualChannels[_vcID].partyB == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#926)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(virtualChannels[_vcID].updateVCtimeout < now,Update vc timeout has not elapsed.)

findings.description:
LedgerChannel.createChannel(bytes32,address,uint256,address,uint256[2]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#409-468) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] == address(0),Channel has already been created.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#416-419)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_balances[1]),CreateChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#441-448)

LedgerChannel.deposit(bytes32,address,uint256,bool) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#539-597) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#545-548)
	- require(bool)(recipient == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] || recipient == Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#549-552)
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] == recipient (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#556)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_balance),deposit: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#558-565)
	- Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1] == recipient (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#576)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_balance),deposit: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#578-585)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true,Tried adding funds to a closed channel)

findings.description:
LedgerChannel.consensusCloseChannel(bytes32,uint256,uint256[4],string,string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#599-677) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen == true) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#608)
	- require(bool)(totalEthDeposit == _balances[0] + _balances[1]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#615)
	- require(bool)(totalTokenDeposit == _balances[2] + _balances[3]) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#616)
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0] == ECTools.recoverSigner(_state,_sigA)) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#634-637)
	- require(bool)(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1] == ECTools.recoverSigner(_state,_sigI)) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#638-641)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transfer(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[0],_balances[2]),happyCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#651-657)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].token.transfer(Channels[_lcID].partyAddresses[1],_balances[3]),happyCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#658-664)

LedgerChannel._isContained(bytes32,bytes,bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1028-1049) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- cursor == _root (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1048)

LedgerChannel.initVCstate(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,address,address,uint256[2],uint256[4],string) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#754-818) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].isOpen,LC is closed.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#764)
	- require(bool,string)(Channels[_lcID].updateLCtimeout < now,LC timeout not over.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#768)
	- require(bool)(_isContained(_initState,_proof,Channels[_lcID].VCrootHash) == true) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#791-793)

LedgerChannel.byzantineCloseChannel(bytes32) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#947-1026) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(channel.isOpen,Channel is not open) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#951)
	- require(bool)(channel.isUpdateLCSettling == true) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#952)
	- require(bool)(channel.numOpenVC == 0) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#953)
	- require(bool,string)(channel.updateLCtimeout < now,LC timeout over.) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#954)
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[0],tokenbalanceA),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#999-1005)
	- require(bool,string)(channel.token.transfer(channel.partyAddresses[1],tokenbalanceI),byzantineCloseChannel: token transfer failure) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_025.sol#1006-1012)
